name: Super Tank Attack
description:
Destroy the enemy and protect the enesphere in this adrenaline-fueled, fast-paced arcade tank shooter, where lightning-fast reflexes are the key to victory.

Super Tank Attack features :

_ Intense Tank Battles: Take control of a powerful tank and dive into heart-pounding battles across diverse and colorful environments. From desolate desert landscapes to sci-fi arenas.
_ Single player campaign mode : Battle your way through an array of ever increasingly difficult stages
_ 2 player local co-op mode : Team up and take out the enemy forces.
_ Exciting bonus stages : (single player mode only)
_ Super tank weapons : Grab the power ups and bring the pain.
_ Bonus pick ups : boost your score with time/points bonuses.
_ Achievements and online leaderboards : Post your top score and show them who's no.1
_ Beautifully designed exciting graphics
_ Exclusive sound track/FX from Tony Longworth
_ Gamepad/Keyboard control supported
_ Please note - at least 1 x controller is required for 2 player co-op mode
